title: Amy Shares A Very Important PSA After She Was Almost Scammed  + We Listen to More Listener Theme Song Submissions + Mailbag: Daughter’s friend has a ‘Boyfriend’ on Roblox
itunes:title: Amy Shares A Very Important PSA After She Was Almost Scammed  + We Listen to More Listener Theme Song Submissions + Mailbag: Daughter’s friend has a ‘Boyfriend’ on Roblox
description:
Amy shares an important PSA to anyone who has ever had someone come out to their house to give a quote on work. Bobby goes through more submissions from listeners who are writing songs for our new theme song! Bobby reads an email from a listener who wants to do after finding out her daughter’s friend has a ‘boyfriend’ on Roblox.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
